page.title: 15PETS
page.content: THE MAIN PETS IN FILGRAVE ARE CATS & DOGS.THERE ARE ALSO HORSES,MR ROBESON WHO OWNS A STALLION THAT WAS IN THE OLYMPICS AND WON A BRONZE MEDAL.THERE ARE ALSO TORTOISES & BIRDS.MY FRIEND OWNS A GOAT.THERE IS A NEW LADY IN OUR VILLAGE WHO HAS I5 DOGS, 1 POODLE AND 14 PEKENESE,WHICH SHE BREEDS,SHE ALSO HAS 5 CATS & 2 BUDGIES.THERE ARE ALSO RABBITS & CHICKENS.IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE MORE ANIMALS THAN THERE ARE PEOPLE. I THINK THAT IS BECAUSE PETS ARE COMPANY FOR YOU.THE MAIN PLACES WHERE THE DOGS ARE WALKED ARE IN THE PLAYING FEILD OR DOWN THE ROAD.THERE ARE NOT SO MANY PETS IN THE CITIES BECAUSE THERE IS NO PLACES TO WALK YOUR DOGS & BECAUSE THERE ARE NOT VERY MANY HOUSES WITH BIG ENOUGH GARDENS.PETS CAN ALSO BE USED FOR SPORT BUT I THINK IT IS MEAN.SPORTS THEY ARE USED FOR ARE MOSTLY RACING.
